overview:
Drew Ianni is the Creator and Event Chairman of AppNation, the leading independent global conference focusing on the consumer applications industry.

Formerly, as the Chairman of ad:tech, the largest digital marketing global conference and exposition series, Drew helped produce eighteen ad:tech events across the three continents managing North American events in San Francisco, Chicago, and New York while helping launch new events in Miami, Sydney, Singapore, and Shanghai.

Prior to ad:tech, Drew as the President and CEO of atmosphere.BBDO (now Proximity.BBDO), the digital marketing services division of BBDO North America, a leading global advertising agency network in the Omnicom network of companies.

Prior to his tenure at BBDO, he served, respectively, as an equity research analyst (interactive services) at the investment bank Lazard, Freres & Co and an online advertising analyst at Jupiter Communications. He started his digital career at the pioneering interactive agency, CKS Partners, in Cupertino in 1995.
